Title: Seapeak Hispania arrives laden at Lubmin; to be deployed as floating storage unit
Description: The 140,500 m3 Shell-controlled Seapeak Hispania arrived laden at the German island of Rugen today, where it will serve as a floating storage unit for the Deutsche ReGas-operated 5.2 bn m3 a year Deutsche Ostsee floating LNG terminal in Lubmin in the northeast of Germany.
Author: CK

Title: Finland’s Inkoo LNG terminal to receive the Exemplar FSRU within the next week
Description: Finland is preparing to receive the 150,900 m3 Exemplar floating storage and regasification unit between Dec. 25 and 28 for installation at the 1.6 mtpa Inkoo floating LNG receiving terminal, with the Exemplar's arrival paving the way for the start of LNG imports and the end of Finland’s reliance on Russian gas.
Author: CK

Title: Italy’s OLT offers two January LNG imports slots for auction at Toscana terminal
Description: Italy’s Offshore LNG Toscana is offering two LNG import slots in January on a first-come, first-served basis at its 2.8 mtpa Toscana floating LNG import terminal off the coast of Livorno through auctions beginning today.
Author: CK

Title: Shell’s Prelude FLNG resumes exports after a two-month-long maintenance
Description: The Shell-operated 3.6 mtpa Prelude floating LNG facility offshore Western Australia has resumed exports after halting exports on Oct. 17 for planned maintenance.
Author: CK

Title: Portugal’s Galp signs 20-year deal with NextDecade for 1 mtpa from Rio Grande
Description: Portugal’s energy firm Galp has agreed to buy 1 mtpa of LNG from US project developer NextDecade’s proposed 27 mtpa Rio Grande LNG project in Brownsville, Texas. The contract price is indexed to the US Henry Hub natural gas price.
Author: CK
